meanings.definition: Resembling a bean in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The small, round, beanlike seeds were scattered across the field.
meanings.sent2: The beanlike shape of the pendant made it a unique piece of jewelry.
meanings.sent3: The beanlike clouds in the sky seemed to be playing hide and seek with the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were beanlike, reflecting the excitement of the upcoming event.
meanings.sent5: The beanlike pattern on the fabric added a touch of whimsy to the dress.
